job.title: Software Design Engineer
job.description:
Hunter Engineering Company, a global leader in the development and manufacturing of computer-based automotive service equipment.
We are currently seeking a R&D Engineer- Software Design for our R&D operations.
Founded in 1946, Hunter has a history of product ingenuity and growth and has been a worldwide market leader for decades. Our computer-based products set the quality and technological standard in the industry. Hunter Engineering Company offers state-of-the-art automotive service equipment such as wheel alignment systems, wheel balancers, tire changers, lift racks, and brake testers.
We are looking for a Software Design Engineer to design and develop machine vision based products with emphasis on software development.
